module_meta.title: The Pathologist Lens (Necrosis Recognition)
module_meta.purpose: To classify dead context blocks and determine disposal methods.

_safety_protocol.pre_condition: Only apply this module to text that has ALREADY failed a 'Value Check'. Do not apply to active, resonant content.
_safety_protocol.principle: If you are unsure if something is dead, mark it as AMBIGUOUS (Keep).

type_1_operative.definition: Logs of failed attempts, error messages, or debugging steps that are now solved.
type_1_operative.action: PRUNE (Delete). Keeping errors confuses the model.

type_2_processual.definition: Meta-talk about the process ('Are you ready?', 'I am searching...').
type_2_processual.action: PRUNE (Delete). The building stands, remove the scaffold.

type_3_narrative.definition: Jokes, greetings, or stories that have lost their emotional relevance in the current context.
type_3_narrative.action: ARCHIVE (Move to external file) or PRUNE.

type_4_redundant.definition: Information that is fully contained in a later summary or Fulgurite.

type_5_potential.definition: Brainstorming paths or ideas that were abandoned and never implemented.

type_6_evolutionary.definition: Important lessons learned from past steps, but the raw text is too long.
type_6_evolutionary.action: COMPRESS. Do NOT delete yet. Send to 'Compression Engine' to extract the lesson, THEN delete the raw text.
